test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test_strings ( id UInt64, str String, ) ENGINE = MergeTree() ORDER BY id
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_strings SELECT number, concat('prefix', toString(number), 'suffix') FROM numbers({table_size})
test.query: SELECT count() FROM test_strings WHERE str LIKE '%middle%' SETTINGS optimize_rewrite_like_perfect_affix=1
